text:
Let us say one scenario, where the client has:
• 40 templates (used over two years) so need to clean some of them
    ◦ I did not even count all the modules that are used
• 250+ pages that need redesign (extra blog/events 500+)
• Multilingual + Content Staging = :S 
So doing it page by page is a small issue, as in *sandbox* you arent able to copy pages from *Live* to *Sandbox* (Stage) and vice versa
• so for some big overhaul it doesnt make job any easier
    ◦ coming from other world where staging is staging (full copy)
